description: head and shoulders to chestline of a man looking at the viewer with a slight smile on his face; the shirt he wears appears to be collarless and his hair looks thick and is combed off his face; done in painterly black lines of various densities
inscription: LL of sheet, in pencil: Lächelnder Mann | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: b. 4 48/16 E 85-A | LRC of sheet in red pencil: 55 an | LRC of sheet in pencil, on verso: L-10
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 22
title: Smiling Man
